snippet: President Vladimir V. Putin of Russia announced that he planned to divorce his wife of 29 years, Lyudmila, who for years has barely appeared in public.
abstract: Russian President Vladimir V Putin announces that he plans to divorce his wife of 29 years, Lyudmila, who for years has barely appeared in public; free of the election cycle in his third term and concerned about his popularity, he may now hope to create a more open personal narrative; observers and citizens wonder if there will be a new first lady.

byline.original: By ELLEN BARRY and DAVID M. HERSZENHORN

lead_paragraph: President Vladimir V. Putin of Russia announced that he planned to divorce his wife of 29 years, Lyudmila, who for years has barely appeared in public.

headline.seo: Putins Finally Appear Together, to Announce Split
headline.main: Rarely Together, Putins Meet Up Only to Split Up
headline.print_headline: Rarely Together, Putins Meet Up Only to Split Up
